entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Analysis doesn't produce warnings from generic parameter annotations from a string input #95140
  • [mono][wasi] Fix ALC support, See the WASI comment in `ves_icall_System_Reflection_Assembly_InternalLoad`. #95137
  • [mono][wasi] Stand up AOT tests in ci #95136
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Missing constructor for SortedList #95131
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink has not had a non-preview release #95126
  • [mono] ICU data file is not part of the bundle in library mode #95124
    9.0.0
  • Building from codespace is failing because of cmake version #95122
  • Trim analyzer: Doesn't produce warnings due to annotated generic parameter in various situations #95121
  • Trim analyzer: Implement type name parsing #95118
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs test Decrypt_512_CekDoesNotDecrypt_FixedValue fails on Fedora 38 #95115
    9.0.0
  • Stackoverflow exception in `NetworkStream.DataAvailable` after migration do .NET 6 #95114
  • Build failure on runtime-community after #94590 #95113
    9.0.0
  • Add a String reverse method #95110
  • ASP.NET Core 6.0 Crash in long running 0x80131506 #95108
  • Http/3 performs a lot worse than Http/1.1 or Http/2. What could be wrong? #95104
  • `System.Memory.Tests` - segfault on coreclr Ubuntu/x64 #95103
  • [wasm] `runtime-wasm-perf` AOT job always times out on helix #95101
    9.0.0
  • Backport #72274 Avoid adding an HttpClient.Timeout message to ConnectTimeout exceptions to 6.0 branch #95097
  • SetLastWriteTime fails on NFS #95096
    Future

Closed

  • Breaking change: Untyped Deserialize no longer forwards the type to JsonConverter<T> #77173
    7.0.x
  • S.T.J. Source Generation serialization to stream fails for record types #75139
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #81771
    Future
  • JsonSerializer allocates too much memory when serializing html strings #62900
    Future
  • Enable custom converter tests in src-gen mode #60020
    Future
  • Consider consolidating logic of JSON Snake/Kebab naming with Camel #77262
    Future
  • Attribute `foo` used in `[JsonPolymorphic(TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName = "foo")]` does not get deserialized #79933
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Method to obtain an "empty" JsonDocument #59303
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: JsonDocument.TryParse #77849
    Future
  • Port System.Collections documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88565
    9.0.0
  • Produced ProductVersion is different in SDK 8 compared to previous versions when you use git #95134
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Tests.FunctionalTests.StemCorrectWithDifferentWildCards #44281
    Future
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Tests.FunctionalTests.VerifyInMemoryDirectoryInfo_IsNotEmpty #50542
    Future
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProviderTests.UsePollingFileWatcher_UseActivePolling_HasChanged_SymbolicLink(useWildcard: False) #62759
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProviderTests failing when running libraries tests #69470
    Future
  • .NET 8 `QuicConnection` AuthenticationException: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch #95072
    9.0.0
  • [VIRTUAL] Value link._sites.de, which has null value, is dereferenced inside function link.Sites #94754
  • [Regression] Segmentation fault during 'dotnet build' via qemu #95120
  • [wasm] 7.0 - Having Space In Path Fails Builds On MacOS #92335
    9.0.0
  • Stack buffer overrun exception occuring in System.Security.Cryptography #94569
  • [API Proposal]: Add readonly Capacity property to HashSet<T> and Dictionary<K,V> and TrimExcess to HashSet<T> #66426
    9.0.0
  • [mono][reflection] ArgumentNullException calling `GetCustomAttributes` on user-defined subtype of `ParameterInfo` #94488
    8.0.x
  • Type.GetType of invalid type fails AOT compilation #94830
  • .NET8 AOT produces faulty win-x64 static library #95100
  • Add a String reverse method #95111
  • JsonSerializer IgnoreReadOnlyProperties Not Working for Enumerable Properties #95080
  • Linux: Segfault in strlen running helloworld.cs #95070
  • NativeAOT compiler fails when it tries to emit a throw for BadImageFormatException #94107
  • Properly test the domain of values in `VARIANT` scenarios #94521
    9.0.0
  • NET Core 3.1 - Scaffold - Could not load file or assembly System.Runtime, Version=4.2.2.0 #38915
    Future
  • Codepage improvement for System.Text.Encoding.CodePages #44401
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Base 64 Decoding Should Have An Auto-Padding Option #93552

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing wasi aot #95151
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #95150
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #95149
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #95148
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • Ensure MetricsSubscriptionManager disposing #95147
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] CI: Add AOT library tests job #95146
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix build of host tests for s390x / ppc64 / armv6 #95145
    area-Host
  • Trimming: Add tests for handling of annotated string type names representing generic instantiations #95143
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes on AddOptionsWithValidateOnStart #95135
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Fix FormatException error message when parsing invalid UTF8 inputs #95133
    needs-area-label
  • [hot_reload] Remove pass1 #95130
    area-EnC-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for 3A groups #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Switch arm32 call-finally to be similar to other targets #95117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Add insEncodeReg* methods #95105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Maintain a per-thread cache of pinning GC handles #95098
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95082
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Ensure invalid type in Type.GetType doesn't crash #95109
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not generate `.rsrc` section for static libraries #95106
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Make runtime compatible with VMR cross-builds (#95088)" #95144
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi] Fix AOT. #95141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix a typo in jitconfigvalues.h comment #94849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix publishing failure due to lack of buildid on Musl AOT nupkgs #95138
    area-Build-mono
  • Add a optional AOT mode on wasm which doesn't depend on c++ unwinding so … #95074
    arch-wasm
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.1
  • Fix incremental servicing condition #95119
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't run crossgen2 or ilc when cross-building in source-build #95088
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Predicate register placeholder methods and Z registers #95016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary xml docs #94993
    documentation, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #94861
    area-System.Net.Http
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix printing Helix workitems count for Android #95061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [perf] Run localized Blazor scenario #95023
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • [wasm] perf: Disable aot job on runtime-wasm-perf run on PRs #95102
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasi] Initial wasi/aot build support #95051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Ensure ExceptionStringIds are handled #95053
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Extend testing domain for VARIANT #95095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Change to use std int for Interop tests #95040
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Runtime Identifiers to .NET 6.0 #94913
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Merge CodeGenBringUpTests projects #94122
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread #94855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] [Question] this project will be added to main repo? #2435
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7->8 SDK upgrade breaks the build (in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Extensibility.Build package) #37112
  • .NET 8 SDK upgrade breaks MSBuildLocator #37111
  • minimumExpectedTests for dotnet test #37101
  • Wasm-tools fails to build because it calls GetTempFileName and runs out of temporary files #37098

Closed

  • Bring Tye features into the SDK #34535
  • dotnet run stops without any output #36819
  • Dotnet watch unable to detect 2nd blazor app #37041

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Ensure we deploy all Roslyn binaries into the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHosts #37113
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to the RTM release build #36870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2321786 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Parse -d command differently based on position #35492
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Wcwidth.Sources from 1.0.0 to 2.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #37032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected error when refencing an F# project from a C# project #70946
  • Reduce the size of the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHost directories #70945
  • IDE failing to save files before build #70938
  • Track non-fatal errors in integration test logs #70937

Closed

  • csc.exe exits with code -2146232797 when attempting to concatenate strings that are part of an inline array #70910
    17.9
  • File ordering during solution load batching #26547
    Backlog
  • VS locks analyzers preventing package restore #25811
    Backlog
  • EditorConfig is not used for files included as content #25888
    Backlog
  • Empty MetadataReferences for project referencing other project from same solution. #25921
    Backlog
  • "Find All References" navigates to source locations on every click #25969
    Backlog
  • "Place 'System' directives first when sorting usings" option reset after upgrade #25971
    Backlog
  • Introduce local for awaited result not working #25312
    Backlog
  • Analyzer 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Diagnostics.SimplifyTypeNames.CSharpSimplifyTypeNamesDiagnosticAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.InvalidOperationException' #25352
    Backlog
  • Error when analyzing code #25354
    Backlog
  • TryApplyChanges fails (returns false) when refactoring a file that is open, but has not been activated. #25425
    Backlog
  • Navigation should work on GetPinnableReference method #25610
    Backlog
  • Roslyn lightbulb actions should have a distinct 'code generating fix' action category #24998
    Backlog
  • Support all Linq methods in Linq query to linq method conversion #25112
    Backlog
  • C# Intellisense Incorrect IDE0019 'use pattern matching' for array element across method call #25207
    Backlog
  • Enum reference all blue in intellisense tooltip #25263
    Backlog
  • Decompiler: NullReferenceException in DecompileSymbolAsync #24626
    Backlog
  • take advantage of Trackspan of ITextImage that are used as underlying implementation of SnapshotSourceText #24875
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Add local functions names to the navigation list #24943
    Backlog
  • Please add more information to AD0001 #24346
    Backlog
  • Surprising completion selection in Roslyn test #24540
    Backlog
  • Find all references Goto Next/Prev Location doesn't work as excpected #24027
    Backlog
  • AbstractEncapsulateFieldCommandHandler disables cancellation and still uses cancellation token afterwards #24153
    Backlog
  • No diagnostic ID in the error list for analyzer diagnostics on 15.5 RTW #23588
    Backlog
  • 'Replaces a method with property' refactoring should not be enabled for a method that overrides a metadata method #23593
    Backlog
  • CSharpRenameTrackingCodeFixProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #23640
    Backlog
  • Need to fix the localization of Templates.csproj #23649
    Backlog
  • Espression not supported when mousing over LINQ/SQLite command at runtime #22954
    Backlog
  • Migrate Roslyn to Editor’s PatternMatcher and delete its own copy #23089
    Backlog
  • Documentation comment tags conversions get stuck when a cref="System.Int32" is present in the comment. #22526
    Backlog
  • Failing Test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Structure.BlockStructureServiceTests.TestSimpleLambda #22547
    Backlog
  • OnDownloadFullDatabaseStartedWorkerAsync registers bad task with Task Status Center #22697
    Backlog
  • ContextIntervalTree.GetSmallestContainingIntervalWorker does not find node with equal endpoint on right side of tree. #22090
    Backlog
  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpFormatting.PasteCodeWithLambdaBody test is flaky #21700
    Backlog
  • During async loading, we shoudl assume the compiler version is the 'latest' not the 'default'. #21070
    Backlog
  • 'Inline temporary variable' fix breaks code and doesn't actually remove the variable #21191
    Backlog
  • Cancelling inline rename does not revert caret position #21207
    Backlog
  • F# missing syntactic classification highlighting #70905
  • [Bug]: Visual studio 2022 debugger C# .Net framework application mistakenly thought this was a C++ project And not showing variable values #70888
  • [Completion] Add override/partial/new completion sooner #20475
    Backlog
  • DeclarationFinder APIs should be more explicit about languages that don't support compilations #20573
    Backlog
  • Handle OOM in TemporaryStorageServiceFactory without crashing #20621
    Backlog
  • Reduce scope of the "Convert to throw expression" refactoring #20910
    Backlog
  • Unexpected overload resolution ambiguity while using collection expression #70943
  • OpenSolutionAsync - first 5 projects have empty Documents #19978
    Backlog
  • Simplify Find All References for one reference #20256
    Backlog
  • Change default for "Place 'System' first when sorting usings" to true? #19797
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.CSharp.UnitTests.Classification.SyntacticTaggerTests.TestTagsChangedForEntireFile is hanging #19822
    Backlog
  • CSharpUseNamedArgumentsCodeRefactoringProvider crashed with IndexOutOfRangeException #19135
    Backlog
  • Bad sorting from Metadata as source #19185
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Make 'YouCannotRenameThisElement' also display where/why it failed. #19252
    Backlog
  • Null Reference when attempting to navigate to a constructor from Find All References #18666
    Backlog
  • Preview never shows if you drop the inline lightbulb #18849
    Backlog
  • Code Style option to preserve, insert or remove empty lines #18186
    Backlog
  • Invoking the light bulb in a workflow expression editor crashes #17008
    Backlog
  • Completion lists in workflow expression editors doesn't show help #17009
    Backlog
  • The "'var' preferences" "elsewhere" setting to "Prefer 'var'" does not fire #17040
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio crashes when attempting to match a tuple using var and then filter on the newly declared variable #17321
    Backlog
  • Get "Execute Suggested Action" dialog twice when "Fix All" #16084
    Backlog
  • Extra * added on the line after a block comment ends. #16128
    Backlog
  • Code completion for tuples #16565
    Backlog
  • New Find All References opens WinForms designer #15478
    Backlog
  • Preview pane for code style options should be resizable. #15685
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb doesn't consistently show #15753
    Backlog
  • Introduce local quick fix by declaring the local first #15879
    Backlog
  • DPL: Inline Rename "gives up" on SyntaxNode #14977
    Backlog
  • GenerateDefaultConstructors differences between C# and VB #15005
    Backlog
  • Go to Implementation doesn't deal with types that have type forwards #13646
    Backlog
  • Roslyn could not find references for some projects #13859
    Backlog
  • No api to get project errors. #14103
    Backlog
  • Naming Rules should include more modifiers (virtual, override, ...?) #13250
    Backlog
  • CodeStyle Tools Options window : the very first click on the preferences/severity dropdown is swallowed by the datagrid #13577
    Backlog
  • CodeStyle Tools Options window : change header row color #13580
    Backlog
  • CodeStyle Tools Options window: show correct and incorrect examples in the preview window. #13581
    Backlog
  • Renaming too long, constrained type parameter of class with event handler does not update UI #11409
    Backlog
  • IDE0006 warning issued, but no failed task in logfile #12607
    Backlog
  • Rename tracking is noticeably faster than inline rename #9203
    Backlog
  • Add support for 3rd party result providers for Language Services such as Find All References, GoToDefinition, etc. #9655
    Backlog
  • Solution-wide operations should not cause multiple file save dialogs #10088
    Backlog
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.8.0 #70919
  • cref's IntelliSense orders types by longest arity #8623
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Cannot generate `override` body if method contains parameter of type `nint` or `nuint` on projects targeting frameworks which do not support them natively #70782
  • Revisit params logic in OverloadResolution #70923
  • CodeModel navigation from XAML fails on expression-bodied methods #8103
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • To not offer overrrides that woudl collide with existing members #70944
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • [Port] Handle missing ISimplifactionService implementation for non-C#/VB langauges #70933
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, untriaged
  • Update extract-method to respect returning by-ref #70931
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add a unit-test for a customer scenario #70939
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix F# classification #70940
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix override completion with nint/nuint parameters #70925
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Order items in cref completion by arity #70929
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable route embedded language features in vscode #70927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure completion always use frozen partial semantic #70926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2321284 #70928
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RDG does not support [FromQuery] for optional parameters #52315
  • Identity: Check/ensure that base.OnModelCreating is called when AppDbContext inherits from IdentityDbContext. #52314
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #52312
  • Changes to IdentityApiEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions made get api/User/manage/info pointless #52311
  • OutputCache - Racing condition returns empty response when locking enabled #52310
  • Azure B2C does not work with latest Blazor Web App Identity template #52309
  • After upgrade to dotnet 8 UseAngularCliServer broken #52308
  • .NET 8 - app_offline.htm is not correctly stopping site #52307
  • App does not take settings from appsettings.Development.json in Debug/Development #52306
  • Aftet dotnet 8 upgrade ws-federation with ADFS broken #52304
  • Signing keys not retrieved from authority when using AddJwtBearer #52296
  • The 499 status code may be returned when using Request timeouts and Exception Handler together #52295
  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet watch run --pathbase=/ doesn't work in .NET 8 #52294
  • Blazor custom paste with .net8 #52293
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Error when serializing InteractiveRequestOptionsSerializerContext #52291
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Base URI comparison is case sensitive #52288
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] UI navigation based on (tree)router nodes #52287
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52286
  • Shouldn't the .NET 8 Blazor Web App template show client-server communication for WebAssembly SPAs? #52285
  • Incorrect swagger.json generation when using FromForm parameters without the WithOpenApi extension method #52284
  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://xxxxx.b2clogin.com/<TenantId>/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application #52283
  • Support AsyncPageable for Blazor ItemsProviderRequest #52282
  • Add API to specify antiforgery request token source #52281
  • warning ASP0023: Route '[action]/{session}' conflicts with another action route. An HTTP request that matches multiple routes results in an ambiguous #52278
  • .NET Core 8 Blazor Web App with interactive location is Global and interactive render mode is WebAssmebly or Auto ,Page in Server Project will appear moment then jump to not found #52276
  • [Blazor] Framework support for per-page JavaScript logic #52273

Closed

  • Blazor Web App Run Error when project name contain Chinese #52109
    8.0.x
  • ComputeComponentTypeNameHash does not handle multi-byte type names correctly #50879
    8.0.x
  • Perf regression: fortunes #52279
  • [.net 8][Blazor] <Navigating> tag is not working (or improve documentation) #52257
  • Guidance on hosted WASM applications #52290
  • Blazor 8 Authentication system is not working on IIS with a Reverse Proxy #52292
  • `FromHeader` in `AsParameter` does not work with RequestDelegateGenerator #52302
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #52264
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52280
  • Dependency Injection in Asp.Net Core 8 froze in `GetRequiredService` call #52275
  • blazor.web.js missing from publish output #52266
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #52261

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52316
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    needs-area-label
  • Make custom ApplicationName work for hosting and user secrets #52305
    community-contribution, area-hosting
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (main) #52301
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (8.0) #52300
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (7.0) #52298
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 7.0.x
  • No longer retry ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #52274
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52232
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix the `::after` root component element selector #52233
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Stop retrying entire HTTP/3 test classes #52258
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Delete Stale Chunks #52272
    area-auth, 9.0-preview1
  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExceptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (6.0). #52260
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Support NavigateTo when enhanced nav is disabled #52267
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI] CollectionView virtualization broken when not using templated columns #18967
    Backlog

  • [tests] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #18961

  • [iOS] AbsoluteLayout not rendering child elements #18956
    Backlog

  • [Windows] `PlatformImage.FromStream` crash #18954

    .NET 8 SR3

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9530] Completely broken virtualization in CollectionView #18639

  • keyboard problem #18939
  • Fix the Color validation tests that use shadows #13692

  • [Testing] Failing tests on iOS 14.5 - webView:decidePolicyForNavigationAction:decisionHandler:] was not called #18749
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Publish IOS App Error ZipArchive.framework/ZipArchive' contains bitcode. #18920
  • TableView blows up on iOS/Catalyst when using SceneDelegate #13948
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EF Core 6] EFCore.SqlServer uses EOL version of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #32395
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation regresses performance #32394
  • SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator referencing DateTime instead of DateOnly #32392
  • Issues when using EF with tables that have PK Identity(int.MinValue, 1) with MS SQL #32391
  • Lazy loader throwing invalid operation exceptions #32390
  • [EF Core 8] InvalidCastException when adding Entity with nullable PK: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Func`3[System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Boolean]' to type 'System.Func`3[System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean]'. #32387
  • .Net8 PostgreSql scaffold T4 Template problem #32385
  • .NET 8 migration on .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid App causes exception: The type initializer for "<Module>" threw an exception. #32384
  • [EF Core 8] [Breaking Change] - error on working with explicit many-to-many relations with OnDelete.Restrict #32383

Closed

  • EFC 8.0: Precompiled model: Error CS0041 Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.'  #32321
  • `ExecuteUpdate` doesn't work on JSON columns? #32367
  • ToJson() not working for entity with a Property named Id #32360
  • HasKey(p => new { p.Id, p.ComplexType.Property }) does not seem to work #32350
  • 'The property is configured as an EF8 primitive collection. Primitive collections in a Cosmos model are discovered by convention #32307
  • Timestamp doesn't work when the property value is updated in code #32270
  • Cancelled token does not prevent execution of ExecuteDeleteAsync(token) #31448
    7.0.16

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle shadow navigations when loading with split queries #32396
  • Correctly parse JSON from string #32393
  • Stop keeping a reference to the model in LazyLoader instances and the Castle interceptor #32388

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32379
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369
